text: Derry Township may be any of these places in the U.S. state of Pennsylvania: *Derry Township, Dauphin County, Pennsylvania, contains the community of Hershey, which is home to The Hershey Company *Derry Township, Mifflin County, Pennsylvania *Derry Township, Montour County, Pennsylvania *Derry Township, Westmoreland County, Pennsylvania Category:Pennsylvania township disambiguation pages
title: Derry Township, Pennsylvania
